sys_ux_client_script.name: Call Single Page

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_136282ac3b363a10bc1ccdd643e45a6f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">534ad6883b6e3a10bc1ccdd643e45ac7</macroponent><name>Call Single Page </name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api }) {
  const selectedId = api.context.props.selectedId;
  console.log("call single page ",api.context.props);
  // guard กันค่า -1
  if (!selectedId || selectedId === '-1' || selectedId === -1) {
    api.setState('request', {});
    api.setState('documents', []);
    return;
  }

  // ✅ สั่งให้ data resource ทำงาน
  api.runDataResource('look_up_a_single_request');
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-29 09:06:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>136282ac3b363a10bc1ccdd643e45a6f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Call Single Page </sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_136282ac3b363a10bc1ccdd643e45a6f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-29 09:14:06</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
